Package showboard

Interface IPawn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISquare
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveEntity, Bob, Crystal, Dirt, Enemy, Exit, Rock, Wall
    public interface IPawn
extends ISquare

    The Interface IPawn.

    A class can implement the IPawn interface when it wants to move on a IBoard.

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Anne-Emilie DIET
    See Also:
    IBoard, ISquare, Point
